snippet: Ryan Seacrest is on the verge of completing a new contract with NBCUniversal that will include occasional appearances on the "Today" show, among other elements.
abstract: Ryan Seacrest is on the verge of completing a new contract with NBCUniversal that will include occasional appearances on the "Today" show, among other elements.

headline.main: Ryan Seacrest Is Said to Be Close to New Deal With Comcast
